title: Unclaimed raffle winnings.  What do now?
body:
Option 1 - One winner daily for each raffle.   When a raffle prize goes unclaimed we give it to the winner of the next days raffle (so 1 winner gets .4 eth or 2 manekis) so the pot gets bigger until claimed by a very lucky Maneki indeed. 
OR
Option 2 - Distribute to multiple winners.  This way each individual day's prize goes to individual wallets. E.G. If today's eth raffle goes unclaimed (for a second day in a row) tomorrow's raffle will select 3 different wallets as winners.  If just one of those goes unclaimed tomorrow, Thursday's raffle will select 2 winners.  And so on.
author: 0xa86B1ab5bc759FB0B7fc8611e1705688b747f487
